title: 조천규
content:
조천규는 서울
자연과학대학
화학과
교수이자
Bioactive Molecule Synthesis Lab
실장을 겸하고 있다.
목차
1
학력
2
경력
3
연구관심분야
4
동정
5
수상
학력
1993 - 1995 Postdoctoral Fellow, Department of Chemistry, M.I.T. (Prof. P. T. Lansbury)
1989 - 1993 Ph.D. The Johns Hopkins University, Department of Chemistry (Prof. G. H. Posner)
1980 - 1985 B.S. Hanyang University, Department of Industrial Chemistry
경력
1997 – present	Professor, Department of Chemistry, Hanyang University
2014 – present	Director, Center for New Directions in Organic Synthesis (SRC)
2013 – present	Editorial Advisory Board, Organic Letters
2013 – present	Associate Editor, Bull. Korean Chem. Soc.
2013	Vice President, Korean Society of Organic Synthesis
2013 – 2014	Vice Dean, Graduate School, Hanyang University
2012	Vice President, Korean Chemical Society
2010	Executive Chief, Division of Organic Chemistry, Korean Chemical Society
2004 – 2005	Visiting Professor, University of Pennsylvania, Philadelphia, USA (Prof. A. B. Smith)
1995 – 1997	Instructor, Harvard Medical School
연구관심분야
유기화학, 유기합성
동정
2013년 미국화학회 저널 오가닉 레터스(Organic Letters)’ 편집자문위원
수상
2017년 10월 헵스켐 한만정학술상
Hepce Chem - Man Jung Han Academic Award, 2017, Korean Chemical Society
2017	HYU Best Scholar Award, 2017, Hanyang University
2016	Korean Society of Organic Synthesis Scholar Award, 2016
2015	ACP Lectureship Award, Japan and Malaysia
2014	ACP Lectureship Award, Taiwan
2014	Organic Synthesis Lectureship Award, Japan
2014	Sigma-Aldrich Award, Korean Chemical Society
2008	Chang-Sei Hee Scholar Award
